subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: CiCi Bellis defeated Indy De Vroome, 6-2, 6-2, at the Miami Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., for her second career WTA main draw victory.
snippet: CiCi Bellis defeated Indy De Vroome, 6-2, 6-2, at the Miami Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., for her second career WTA main draw victory.
